title: Ghost Chasers
overview: Model and musician Kay Nambier doesn't believe in ghosts. But he's always wondered what lies behind the stories. So, he's travelling to some of Europe's most haunted locations in search of definitive proof of whether or not they really exist. He's joined by psychic Ian Lawman, who claims he can connect with the dead; and high-tech paranormal investigators Chris Hawley and Paul Hobday.
